text: @GovAbbott @GSF_OpenTexas This is ridiculous. TX has reported record cases for the FOURTH DAY IN A ROW. Reopening isn’t worth our lives!!! Do y’all not know how to read numbers?! Get it together and get your lips off of @realDonaldTrump ‘s ass!! #COVID19 #coronavirus
